channel.title: I want to make a RSC server
channel.description:
I have a really cool design drawn up in full detail. This server would have a perfect economy and a full wilderness of pkers. I am not a coder so I don't know where to get started with this. If youre interested in helping point me in the right direction please email me tersch87@gmail. I am a business person and I may be interested in putting in working capital for marketing and coding.
thanks a lot

item.title: I want to make a RSC server
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

RS2 for profit. RSC for fun.

Read full topic
item.source: I want to make a RSC server

item.title: I want to make a RSC server
item.dc:creator: @imabeast imabeast
item.description:
@imabeast wrote:

Not to ruin your idea but the RSC community is about 100ish people. From a business standpoint hosting a RSC server is a terrible idea, from what I’ve seen only about 50% of players buy subscriptions which mean you’d make like 250$ a month on your server. Then you would have to factor in server cost, paying a coder, etc etc… I’d suggest RS2 if you wanted to run it from a business standpoint.

Read full topic
item.source: I want to make a RSC server
